page.title: 13St John's Shopping Precinct.
page.content: {Barclays}is a small branch of the High Street bank.{Snippers}is a very popular hairdresser. At the {Greengrocer}you can buy various vegetables and fruit.{Martins}is a large newsagents shop. The {Hardware/DIY}shop sells pet food, gardening equipment and decorating goods. The{Spar}sells food and drink. {Tweeds},the baker, sells cakes and bread. The{Delicatessen}sells salads, drink and toppings.{E.and A.Davis}is a butcher's shop.{Joan's}sells wool and clothes.{Stanfords}is an estate agent and building society office. Another bank,{Lloyds,}has a branch between Stanfords and the{Chemist.}This sells medicine and cosmetics.{Moonraker,}the carpet shop, is the last of the shops but there is also a{Vet,}who looks after local pets and other animals, who has a surgery behind.
